entries.description: Use buildx instead of Buildah to create multi-architecture KKP container images.
Fix default url configuration of Blackbox exporter.
Alertmanager now allows blackbox exporter to perform healthcheck API call without AuthFailure.
Fix a bug where project scope endpoints for GCP were working only with the presets instead of one of presets or credentials.
OpenStack: Fix project and projectID header propagation for project scoped endpoints.
